author: Eddy Rodriguez
title: City Councilman Says Mayor De Blasio Put Students, Teachers at Risk After Brooklyn High School Principal Dies of Coronavirus
description: Brooklyn principal Dez-Ann Romain died Monday from complications of the novel coronavirus, the first member of the New York City public school system to pass from the virus
content:
A city councilman said New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio put students and teachers at risk after a Brooklyn high school principal died of the novel coronavirus.
Mark Treyger, the councilman who represents District 47 in Brooklyn, said the failure of de Blas… [+2482 chars]
